S.FORM: == Ameenah Gurib == u siwkay niza 10 bulad 17 demiad, Ameenah Gurib, u misingkiway. 1959 a mihca nalecuhan) u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Mauritus ayza sa ci Ameenah Gurib, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 6 bulad 5 demiad. u ngangan niza u ngangan nu Hulam: 阿梅娜·古里布 u ngangan nu Amilika: Ameenah Gurib kakuniza u nasuliatan nu Hulam atu Amilika Bibi Ameenah Firdaus Gurib-Fakim is a Mauritian biodiversity scientist who has served as the President of Mauritiussince 2015. In December 2014, she was selected to be the presidential candidate of the Alliance Lepep. After Kailash Purryag resigned on 29 May 2015, both Prime Minister Sir Anerood Jugnauth and Leader of the Opposition Paul Berenger positively welcomed her nomination, which was unanimously approved in a vote in the National Assembly.

== Ameenah Gorib == o siwkay niza 10 bolad 17 demiad, Ameenah Gorib, o misingkiway. 1959 a mihca nalecohan) o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) no Maoritos ayza sa ci Ameenah Gorib, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 6 bolad 5 demiad. o ngangan niza o ngangan no Holam: 阿梅娜·古里布 o ngangan no Amilika: Ameenah Gorib kakoniza o nasoliatan no Holam ato Amilika Bibi Ameenah Firdaos Gorib-Fakim is a Maoritian biodiversity scientist who has served as the President of Maoritiossince 2015. In December 2014, she was selected to be the presidential candidate of the Alliance Lepep. After Kailash Porryag resigned on 29 May 2015, both Prime Minister Sir Anerood Jognaoth and Leader of the Opposition Paol Berenger positively welcomed her nomination, which was onanimoosly approved in a vote in the National Assembly.
